name: GetAccessibleClients
description:
Retrieve accessible client information for a given organization.

Use this tool to get information about clients accessible to an organization. Call it when you need to retrieve details about clients linked to the organization using the `rsync` value for `orgs`.

parameters.name: organization_subdomain
parameters.description: The subdomain of the client organization. Use 'rsync' as the value to access relevant client information.

parameters.name: request_body_data
parameters.description: An array of JSON objects to include in the request body for additional data required by the API.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Entrata API
